trans-unit.source: Learn how to build hybrid applications that span across the cloud and on premises.

trans-unit.source: Enable Hybrid Applications Spanning Cloud and Premises

trans-unit.source: Hybrid cloud/on-premises applications are a reality of modern IT environments.
trans-unit.target: Hybrid cloud/on-premises applications are a reality of modern IT environments.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure Service Bus helps you leverage existing on-premises assets and create reliable and secure solutions to augment and expand your current infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure Service Bus helps you leverage existing on-premises assets and create reliable and secure solutions to augment and expand your current infrastructure.
